entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
